TopicTitle: How to add pictures from URL

Articles.Content: I don't understand what to do when adding a picture. It says "Add an image from URL" and I don't know what it means. Someone please help me, for it would be greatly appreciated.

Are you talking about the forum attachment system? Because that currently doesn't work you will have to use a image hosting site like imgur. Upload any images to there and then copy the link that says it is for forums (should be the forth one from the top left) when you click on the image, then copy that link.
If you want to attach pictures, host them on another site, like imgur, dropbox or imageshack. Once they are published on the site, copy the URL, then in the forum, paste the URL between tags.
